description: Great Location, Right off of 37th Ave in Jackson Heights. Two minute walk to the 82nd Street 7 Train. 25 Minute Subway ride to Manhattan. Great neighborhood, Lots of AMAZING food, Very Safe, Great Coffee Shops, Lunch Delis, Fruit, Vegetable and Meat Markets, and a variety of ethnic restaurants - Minutes away. Beautiful BIG Studio Apartment, recently renovated. Full kitchen, Full bathroom. Full bed that sleeps 2, along with queen air mattress that can sleep 2 as well. Beautiful outdoor space..
name: Beautiful Spacious Studio Apt. in Jackson Heights
review: Apartamento limpio, excelente equipamiento, excelente ubicación, con acceso inmediato a supermercados, estación de metro, restaurantes, de muy agradables alrededores.  Absolutamente satisfechos con la estadía allí. Totalmente recomendado.
